definition: US Central Intelligence Agency, CIA/abbr. for 中央情報局|中央情报局[Zhong1 yang1 Qing2 bao4 ju2]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Why simply punish CIA lackeys, rather than those who oversaw them?
sentences.chinese: 为什么只惩罚中情局的底层人员而非其监管者呢？

sentences.english: In headquarters of bureau of the affection in Virginia city plot of a politics is planning.
sentences.chinese: 在维吉尼亚州中情局总部一场政治阴谋正在计划着。

sentences.english: There is persuasive evidence that several other European countries collaborated with the CIA.
sentences.chinese: 有证据表明其他几个欧洲国家与中情局也有合作。

sentences.english: Moreover, Googles' connection with the CIA and its venture capital firm extends to sharing at least one key member of personnel.
sentences.chinese: 此外，谷狗和中情局的合作还体现在人事调配方面。

sentences.english: The CIA designed this two-man semi-submersible in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 中情局在上世纪50年代设计了这种两人半潜水设备。

sentences.english: The CIA acts like bullys and expects nobody to fight back?
sentences.chinese: 中情局的行为就像恶霸而且无人能够制止？

sentences.english: The first that the Agency learned of it was through a New China News Agency broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 中情局最初是通过一条中新社的广播知道此事的。

sentences.english: Just one thing- you pull it off, the CIA brings him in.
sentences.chinese: 你拉下他，中情局带走他。

sentences.english: The tragic result was the CIA failed to catch the message.
sentences.chinese: 悲剧性的结果就是中情局没有注意到这条信息。

sentences.english: But the reputed former CIA head in Milan got an eight-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 但公认的前中情局驻米兰负责人则被判处8年徒刑。

sentences.english: Legally, the Agency could not simply give them the money to pay for the packages.
sentences.chinese: 在法律上，中情局不能直接给他们钱支付包裹的费用。

sentences.english: The CIA had an opening for an assassin.
sentences.chinese: 美国中情局要召一个刺客的职位。

sentences.english: That's certainly true of the CIA analyst played by John Malkovich.
sentences.chinese: 约翰马尔科维奇扮演的中情局分析员就是这样的。

sentences.english: A short history of some of the better - known CIA Cold War covert operations.
sentences.chinese: 中情局在冷战中，某些最知名之秘密活动简史。

definition: KGB (Soviet secret police)/member of the KGB
secret service/special service/secret service agent/special agent
Edward Snowden (1983-), American surveillance program whistleblower
Osama bin Laden (1957-2011), leader of Al Qaeda
